title: Font ID - Neon and Techy Fonts on Blueburger Movie Poster
content:
Can anyone identify these two fonts?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090410162250im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/blueburgerfonts3_6056.jpg)
author: malbright

comments.content: The first one (HEY HEY!) I think is [Legerdemain](http://web.archive.org/web/20090410162250/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/legerdemain.htm).
